data.lyric:
[ti:High (Explicit)]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:High (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]High (Explicit) - The Chainsmokers
[00:00.33]Lyrics by：Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Nick Long/Alex Pall/Andrew Taggart/Natalie Salomon/Jeff Halavacs/Ethan Snorek
[00:01.74]Composed by：Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Nick Long/Alex Pall/Andrew Taggart/Natalie Salomon/Jeff Halavacs/Ethan Snorek
[00:03.15]Woah woah
[00:06.07]So far so good
[00:07.82]
[00:10.40]Mhmm mhm mhm yep
[00:13.51]
[00:14.42]Why
[00:16.15]You only say you love me when you're high
[00:19.52]It's like we go through the same s**t every night
[00:22.66]
[00:23.24]Oh why oh why
[00:24.91]You always swear that it's gonna change but it never does
[00:28.70]Why
[00:30.24]You'll only say you love me when you're high
[00:33.72]It's like we go through the same s**t every night
[00:37.34]Oh why oh why
[00:39.07]You always swear that s**t's gonna change but it never does
[00:42.84]Tell me that you're gonna change
[00:44.35]Then act like this instead
[00:45.91]I'm too old to want somebody who's always switching up their friends
[00:49.97]I can't make you love me but at least you could pretend
[00:53.48]Scripts gonna leads to fifths until I'm f**ked out of my head
[00:56.66]You play the same old songs
[00:58.68]I know that you're different in your Air Force Ones
[01:02.16]Filling my prescription I could bite your tongue
[01:05.49]Like I got an addiction yeah
[01:07.68]You always say this s**t's gonna change but it never does
[01:11.38]Why
[01:12.89]You only say you love me when you're high
[01:16.33]It's like we go through the same s**t every night
[01:20.00]Oh why oh why
[01:21.72]You always swear that it's gonna change but it never does
[01:25.50]Why
[01:27.17]You'll only say you love me when you're high
[01:30.45]It's like we go through the same s**t every night
[01:34.17]Oh why oh why
[01:35.93]You always swear that s**t's gonna change but it never does
[01:39.91]I know it's my fault I pick up your phone call
[01:43.18]
[01:43.80]When it's half past one and you're halfway drunk
[01:47.14]You say you love me and it sounds so dumb
[01:50.69]But you're the only one I can run away from the same old songs
[01:55.58]I know that you're different in your Air Force Ones
[01:59.06]Filling my prescription I could bite your tongue
[02:02.57]Like I got an addiction yeah
[02:04.44]You always say this s**t's gonna change but it never does
[02:08.23]Why
[02:09.86]You only say you love me when you're high
[02:13.19]It's like we go through the same s**t every night
[02:16.75]Oh why oh why
[02:18.57]You always swear that it's gonna change but it never does
[02:22.43]Why
[02:23.94]You'll only say you love me when you're high
[02:27.41]It's like we go through the same s**t every night
[02:31.01]Oh why oh why
[02:32.78]You always swear that s**t's gonna change but it never does
[02:36.63]
[02:40.08]You always swear that s**t's gonna change but it never does
[02:43.65]
[02:47.09]You always swear that s**t's gonna change but it never does
data.trans:
[ti:High (Explicit)]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:High (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.33]//
[00:01.74]//
[00:03.15]//
[00:06.07]目前为止 一切顺利
[00:07.82]
[00:10.40]//
[00:13.51]
[00:14.42]为什么
[00:16.15]你只会在你欢欣雀跃的时候才会向我表达爱意
[00:19.52]仿佛每晚我们都会重蹈覆辙
[00:22.66]
[00:23.24]为什么 为什么
[00:24.91]你总是信誓旦旦地说一切将会改变 但这未曾应验
[00:28.70]为什么
[00:30.24]你只会在你欢欣雀跃的时候才会向我表达爱意
[00:33.72]仿佛每晚我们都会重蹈覆辙
[00:37.34]为什么 为什么
[00:39.07]你总是信誓旦旦地说这一切将会改变 但这未曾应验
[00:42.84]告诉我你会做出改变
[00:44.35]但你却违背诺言
[00:45.91]我已历尽沧桑 不再对那些反面无情的人心存期待
[00:49.97]我无法让你真心爱上我 但至少你可以逢场作戏
[00:53.48]事态愈发严重 直到我彻底崩溃
[00:56.66]你还是播放着那些老歌
[00:58.68]我知道你穿着空军一号运动鞋 变得与众不同
[01:02.16]备好药物 我能让你保持沉默
[01:05.49]就像我沉迷其中一样

[01:39.91]我知道这是我的过错 我接听你的电话
[01:43.18]
[01:43.80]现在已经一点半了 你已经醉意朦胧
[01:47.14]你说你深爱着我 但这句话听起来愚蠢至极
